title: Technology
transcription: The rapid advancement of technology has changed the way we live our lives.

title: Automation
transcription: The factory implemented automation to increase productivity and reduce the need for manual labor.

title: Mixed reality (MR)
transcription: Mixed reality (MR) is a technology that combines elements of both virtual reality and augmented reality.

title: Data analytics
transcription: Data analytics helps businesses make informed decisions based on analyzing large sets of data.

title: World Wide Web (WWW)
transcription: The World Wide Web has revolutionized the way we access and share information.

title: Application
transcription: I submitted my job application last week.

title: Mobile app
transcription: I downloaded a new mobile app that helps me track my fitness goals.

title: Web app
transcription: I use a web app to track my daily expenses.

title: Platform
transcription: The politician gave a speech from the platform at the rally.

title: Code
transcription: She entered the access code to unlock the door.

title: Developer
transcription: The software developer worked tirelessly to create a new and innovative app.

title: Interaction
transcription: Effective communication requires an interaction between two or more people.

title: Interface
transcription: The interface of the new software is user-friendly and easy to navigate.

title: Interface design
transcription: The interface design of the new mobile app is very user-friendly.

title: User research
transcription: User research involves conducting interviews and surveys to understand the needs and preferences of the target audience.

title: User-centered design
transcription: User-centered design involves creating products or services tailored to meet the needs and preferences of the end users.

title: Prototype
transcription: The engineers have created a prototype of the new product for testing.

title: Beta version
transcription: I tried out the beta version of the new software to provide feedback on any bugs or issues I encountered.

title: Release
transcription: The company will release the new product next month.

title: Update
transcription: I need to update my phone's software to fix the bug.

title: Patch
transcription: She sewed a patch onto her jeans to cover up the hole.

title: Bug
transcription: There was a bug crawling on the windowsill.

title: Upgrade
transcription: I need to upgrade my phone to get the latest features.

title: Glitch
transcription: There was a glitch in the program that caused it to crash unexpectedly.

title: Crash
transcription: The car crashed into a tree on the side of the road.

title: Error
transcription: There was an error in the calculation of the financial report.

title: Debugging
transcription: The programmer spent hours debugging the code to fix the errors.

title: Integration
transcription: The integration of new technology into the existing system has improved efficiency.

title: Compatibility
transcription: The compatibility of the new software with old systems is crucial for a smooth transition.

title: Troubleshooting
transcription: The troubleshooting process helped to identify and solve the technical issue with the computer.

title: Connectivity
transcription: The high-speed internet provides excellent connectivity for all the devices in the house.

title: Wireless
transcription: I prefer using wireless headphones while working out at the gym.

title: 5G
transcription: The new smartphones are equipped with 5G technology for faster internet speeds.

title: Network security
transcription: Ensuring network security is vital to protect sensitive data from cyber attacks.

title: Data privacy
transcription: Companies need to prioritize data privacy to protect their customers' personal information.

title: Decryption
transcription: The detective worked tirelessly on the decryption of the coded message to uncover crucial information.

title: Authentication
transcription: Two-factor authentication provides an extra layer of security for online accounts.

title: Authorization
transcription: You need authorization from your manager before making purchases over a certain amount.

title: Cyberattack
transcription: The company's website was shut down due to a cyberattack.

title: Backup
transcription: Make sure to regularly backup your important files to avoid losing any data.

title: Restore
transcription: The artist worked tirelessly to restore the centuries-old painting back to its original beauty.

title: Data breach
transcription: The company experienced a major data breach, exposing sensitive information of their customers.

title: Data recovery
transcription: I need to contact a professional for data recovery services after my computer crashed.

title: Data backup
transcription: Make sure to perform a regular data backup to prevent data loss.

title: Data storage
transcription: The company uses cloud-based data storage to securely store all customer information.

title: Cloud storage
transcription: I back up all my files on cloud storage so I can access them from anywhere.

title: Data center
transcription: The company's data center houses all of its servers and networking equipment.

title: Server farm
transcription: The company relies on a massive server farm to handle all of their website traffic.

title: Data transmission
transcription: The company had a high-speed data transmission system in place to ensure quick and efficient communication.

title: Bandwidth
transcription: Our new internet plan has a higher bandwidth, so we can stream movies without any interruptions.

title: Latency
transcription: High latency in the network caused the video call to be choppy and delayed.

title: Internet speed
transcription: I upgraded my internet speed so now I can stream movies with no buffering.

title: Upload
transcription: Please upload the file to the shared drive before the meeting.

title: Console
transcription: She tried to console her friend after her breakup.

title: Gaming
transcription: I enjoy gaming in my free time, it helps me relax and unwind.

title: PC
transcription: I use my PC for work and gaming.

title: Mobile device
transcription: Please make sure to bring your mobile device to the meeting for the presentation.

title: Wearable technology
transcription: Wearable technology includes smartwatches, fitness trackers, and virtual reality headsets.
